thag6.5:1.3: plavatī → plavati (bj, mr); pariplavati (sya1ed, sya2ed); palavatī (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thag6.5:2.4: abhivaṭṭhaṃva → abhivuṭṭhaṃva (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); abhivaḍḍhaṃva (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
thag6.5:6.1: pamādo → pamādo rajo sabbadā (bj, mr); pamādo rajo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thag6.5:6.6: Mālukyaputto → māluṅkyaputto (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
